attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what its all about. as soon as i opened it, everything went downhill. my fish were drowning, thankfully i was able to save them. my bunny jumped so high he hit his head on the roof and got a concussion. thankfully we got him to the ER in time. my hamsters fit so much food in their cheeks, their cheeks EXPLODED. thankfully they got life saving surgery. i breathed so much air, i choked. this app is DEADLY. never recommending this to anyone. ever.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! MY ANIMALS ALMOST DIED!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to stay current on my new iPhone 11 Pro Max-no issues with phone. I am now having problems hearing calls as the sound goes up then down on its own and the phone keeps shutting off. I am so mad as I use my phone for work. Thank goodness I have an iPad not connected to my cloud. Be careful as I don’t know if it’s an iPhone issue or the app. AppleCare here I come 😭😭😭
attributes.title: Warning!!! New IPhone ruined!

attributes.review: So you know I was doing the daily trying to support the one and only president trump when i got to this app. I downloaded it and opened for only thirty seconds and then my phone started glitching, it took me out of the app but i tried again, it worked but... there is notifications everywhere now and i dont like it. So im warning you please dont get this app it is the worst crap you can find out there!
attributes.title: IT WILL DESTROY YOUR PHONE

attributes.review: i thought this app would be for trump 2020 but it just started playing a band called 100 gecs and it was so bad!!! then they stole my info and put on my microwave fairy emojis, disgusting. i had to get my feelings out so i quickly sang four in her, but they recorded it and sent it to the dark web 😾. gross!!! but at least i have my racism, homophobia, and child abuse in check  still 😼 anyways luvs i hate this app such a bad game so pay to win.  💅💫💗✨🧚
attributes.title: GROSS!!

attributes.review: this app took 17 hours to download, and once i presses the download button and i couldn’t undo it. despite the app appearing as free on the app store, it charged me $100 to purchase. this rally sucked bc i was saving for a new inhaler. whilst the app was downloading i couldn’t do anything else on my phone because it took up all my data to download. my house was on fire and i was unable to call the fire department so all of my things burned down :(. when the app finally downloaded it asked me to state my race. once i did, it brought me to the “asian section”. i immediately did not like that this app was segregated so i decided to delete the app. then it wouldn’t let me delete the app.
attributes.title: belligerent app 🤮

attributes.review: just like the title, everything about this app is terrible. the first thing it did was ask for my private information and i am appalled that it did that!!!! if i could rate this app 0 stars then i definitely would because it isn’t even worth the 1 star. i can’t believe i ever downloaded this app!! i just wanted to support bunker boy :( guess i will be supporting other campaigns who have apps that don’t remind me of moody tuna sardine salad.
attributes.title: MOLDY TUNA SARDINE SALAD

attributes.review: Not only did my phone die twice while trying to download but I was then flooded by a whole bunch of misinformation that only 10 year olds would believe. So called leader doesn’t know the difference between right and wrong. Ra_ist... Doesn’t matter if you put a P or a C in the space they’re both pretty accurate representations on the type of person he is ✨✨Stay informed ✊🏿✊🏿✊🏿✊🏿✊🏿
attributes.title: I CANT BELIEVE HOW SLOW THIS APP TAKES TO DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: It took forever to download and messed up my phone. It was constantly glitching and kicking me out. It also takes your information that you do on your phone and sends it directly to Donald Trump. It’s an invasion of privacy and barely works as it is. I’m hardly ever able to use my phone anymore because of how laggy it is. It took me 2 days to complete this post.
attributes.title: Don’t get this app

attributes.review: I’m honestly shocked at the poor quality of this app. It seems like a bunch of monkeys who had access to a computer took a few hours to develop this. Links that lead to nowhere, random crashes all the time, not to mention all the random pop-up notifications. All in all I would say I get at least 12 notifications a day and that’s just ridiculous. One star.
attributes.title: Stunned.

attributes.review: It’s default setting for notifications is impossible to set. I gave my phone number to sign up and login, and I am now receiving weird spam texts unrelated to the campaign. I was so excited to use this app but feel like it’s glitching out. Every time I close out of the app it makes me login all over again. Disappointed I can’t use it functionally
attributes.title: Won’t stop sending me notifications
